headline: First Industrial Refinancing Extends Debt Maturities And Adds ESG Flexibility
summary: First Industrial Realty Trust (NYSE:FR) has refinanced and amended key unsecured term loans, extending maturities and updating pricing terms. The transaction removes prior SOFR adjustments, increases available capital under its facilities, and updates covenants. The Wells Fargo term loan now includes a potential sustainability linked interest rate feature tied to ESG performance metrics. First Industrial Realty Trust, trading at $58.03, is entering this refinancing with a multiyear record...
